alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:37PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafourche Parish through 515 PM CDT... At 436 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a waterspout over area waterways near Leeville, or 15 miles southeast of Galliano. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Waterspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leeville. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building especially if you spot a tropical funnel cloud or weak waterspout.
